SQL.LOAD: SELECT issue_id, soft_question_id, display_order, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, effective, expiration, issue_question_id FROM elp_issue_question WHERE issue_question_id = :issue_question_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT issue_id, soft_question_id, display_order, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, effective, expiration, issue_question_id FROM elp_issue_question WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.LOAD_FILTERED_LIST: SELECT iq.issue_id, iq.soft_question_id, iq.display_order, iq.created_date, iq.created_by, iq.modified_date, iq.modified_by, iq.effective, iq.expiration, iq.issue_question_id FROM elp_issue_question iq inner join elp_issue_question_list iql on iq.issue_question_id = iql.issue_question_id inner join elp_question_list ql on iql.question_list_id = ql.question_list_id inner join elp_dealer d on ql.code = d.question_list_code WHERE iq.issue_id = :issue_id and d.dealer_id = :dealer_id and sysdate between iq.effective and iq.expiration and sysdate between iql.effective and iql.expiration and sysdate between ql.effective and ql.expiration ORDER BY iql.display_order
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_issue_question SET issue_id = :issue_id, soft_question_id = :soft_question_id, display_order = :display_order, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE issue_question_id = :issue_question_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_issue_question ( issue_id, soft_question_id, display_order, effective, expiration, created_by, issue_question_id ) VALUES ( :issue_id, :soft_question_id, :display_order, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :issue_question_id )
SQL.Available_Question_List: SELECT Distinct q.SOFT_QUESTION_ID ID, Q.description DESCRIPTION from ELP_LANGUAGE l, ELP_SOFT_QUESTION q LEFT OUTER JOIN ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION iq ON q.SOFT_QUESTION_ID = iq.SOFT_QUESTION_ID INNER JOIN ELP_LIST_ITEM li On q.QUESTION_TYPE_ID = li.LIST_ITEM_ID WHERE l.LANGUAGE_ID = :languageId AND li.CODE <> 'DIAG'
SQL.SEARCH_Question_List_detail: SELECT EIQ.issue_question_id ID, EI.description || ' - ' || ESQ.description DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION EIQ INNER JOIN ELP_ISSUE EI ON EIQ.issue_id = EI.issue_id INNER JOIN ELP_SOFT_QUESTION ESQ ON EIQ.soft_question_id = ESQ.soft_question_id WHERE EIQ.EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
SQL.SEARCH_Dealer_List_detail: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(DEALER_NAME)) DESCRIPTION, DEALER_ID ID FROM ELP_DEALER MINUS SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(DEALER_NAME)) DESCRIPTION, DEALER_ID ID FROM ELP_DEALER
SQL.IS_CHILD: SELECT issue_question_id FROM elp_issue_question WHERE soft_question_id = :soft_question_id AND issue_id = :issue_id
